top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

I also like having two pairs at home - one shitty pair where you can get them all gross and nasty, and another pair when working with stuff that needs to stay somewhat nice.

Ain't nobody want to wear wet garbage gloves when installing a shelf in your kitchen, etc..

I keep a reflective vest and a pair of cheaper work gloves in with my spare tire. I figured I could cheap out on the gloves since they are really only meant for emergency use. If I'm going to be going somewhere that requires work gloves, I grab a pair of good ones from the garage.
